subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo matched his Spanish league record of 40 goals in a season by netting a hat trick that included two spectacular long-range shots as Real Madrid beat Atlético Madrid, 4-1.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo matched his Spanish league record of 40 goals in a season by netting a hat trick that included two spectacular long-range shots as Real Madrid beat Atlético Madrid, 4-1.
